page.syntax: C Datagram_Send_With_Receipt(C Host,N port,C data[,C return_pattern])

argument.name: return_pattern
argument.description: Instructions on how to format the data.

page.description: Send data to a host/port wait for returned response.
page.discussion: The .DATAGRAM_SEND_WITH_RECEIPT() method sends data to a host and port, then waits for returned response.
page.example: ? Sockets.datagram_send_with_receipt("127.127.127.127", 4557, "a5.table_enum()" + crlf(), "*" + crlf()) = customer invoice_header product invoice menu invoice_items vendor
